23 #include <cstdint>
24 // Check if thrift version < 0.11.0
25 // or if FORCE_BOOST_SMART_PTR is defined. Ref: https://thrift.apache.org/lib/cpp
26 #if defined(PARQUET_THRIFT_USE_BOOST) || defined(FORCE_BOOST_SMART_PTR)

51 // Check if thrift version < 0.11.0

59 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
60 // Convert Thrift enums to / from parquet enums
61 
62 static inline Type::type FromThrift(format::Type::type type) {
63  return static_cast<Type::type>(type);
64 }
65 
66 static inline LogicalType::type FromThrift(format::ConvertedType::type type) {
67  // item 0 is NONE
68  return static_cast<LogicalType::type>(static_cast<int>(type) + 1);
69 }
70 
71 static inline Repetition::type FromThrift(format::FieldRepetitionType::type type) {
72  return static_cast<Repetition::type>(type);
73 }
74 
75 static inline Encoding::type FromThrift(format::Encoding::type type) {
76  return static_cast<Encoding::type>(type);
77 }
78 
79 static inline Compression::type FromThrift(format::CompressionCodec::type type) {
80  return static_cast<Compression::type>(type);
81 }
82 
83 static inline format::Type::type ToThrift(Type::type type) {
84  return static_cast<format::Type::type>(type);
85 }
86 
87 static inline format::ConvertedType::type ToThrift(LogicalType::type type) {
88  // item 0 is NONE
89  DCHECK_NE(type, LogicalType::NONE);
90  return static_cast<format::ConvertedType::type>(static_cast<int>(type) - 1);
91 }
92 
93 static inline format::FieldRepetitionType::type ToThrift(Repetition::type type) {
94  return static_cast<format::FieldRepetitionType::type>(type);
95 }
96 
97 static inline format::Encoding::type ToThrift(Encoding::type type) {
98  return static_cast<format::Encoding::type>(type);
99 }
100 
101 static inline format::CompressionCodec::type ToThrift(Compression::type type) {
102  return static_cast<format::CompressionCodec::type>(type);
103 }

105 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
106 // Thrift struct serialization / deserialization utilities
107 
108 // Deserialize a thrift message from buf/len. buf/len must at least contain
109 // all the bytes needed to store the thrift message. On return, len will be
110 // set to the actual length of the header.
111 template <class T>
112 inline void DeserializeThriftMsg(const uint8_t* buf, uint32_t* len, T* deserialized_msg) {
113  // Deserialize msg bytes into c++ thrift msg using memory transport.
114  shared_ptr<apache::thrift::transport::TMemoryBuffer> tmem_transport(
115  new apache::thrift::transport::TMemoryBuffer(const_cast<uint8_t*>(buf), *len));
116  apache::thrift::protocol::TCompactProtocolFactoryT<
117  apache::thrift::transport::TMemoryBuffer>
118  tproto_factory;
119  shared_ptr<apache::thrift::protocol::TProtocol> tproto =
120  tproto_factory.getProtocol(tmem_transport);
121  try {
122  deserialized_msg->read(tproto.get());
123  } catch (std::exception& e) {
124  std::stringstream ss;
125  ss << "Couldn't deserialize thrift: " << e.what() << "\n";
126  throw ParquetException(ss.str());
127  }
128  uint32_t bytes_left = tmem_transport->available_read();
129  *len = *len - bytes_left;
130 }
131 
132 // Serialize obj into a buffer. The result is returned as a string.
133 // The arguments are the object to be serialized and
134 // the expected size of the serialized object
135 template <class T>
136 inline int64_t SerializeThriftMsg(T* obj, uint32_t len, OutputStream* out) {
137  shared_ptr<apache::thrift::transport::TMemoryBuffer> mem_buffer(
138  new apache::thrift::transport::TMemoryBuffer(len));
139  apache::thrift::protocol::TCompactProtocolFactoryT<
140  apache::thrift::transport::TMemoryBuffer>
141  tproto_factory;
142  shared_ptr<apache::thrift::protocol::TProtocol> tproto =
143  tproto_factory.getProtocol(mem_buffer);
144  try {
145  mem_buffer->resetBuffer();
146  obj->write(tproto.get());
147  } catch (std::exception& e) {
148  std::stringstream ss;
149  ss << "Couldn't serialize thrift: " << e.what() << "\n";
150  throw ParquetException(ss.str());
151  }
152 
153  uint8_t* out_buffer;
154  uint32_t out_length;
155  mem_buffer->getBuffer(&out_buffer, &out_length);
156  out->Write(out_buffer, out_length);
157  return out_length;
158 }
159 
160 } // namespace parquet
